textContent:
I think nuclear energy is not necessarily good for society because there's a problem of disposal of wasted mucker material.
and it can lead to the use for nuclear weapons.
so I don't think nuclear power is good for society.

you said the nuclear power system is becoming safer thanks to your developing technology, but I don't think that's true.

human beings house development of technology for a long time but there's still nuclear accidents Chernobyl and Fukushima, so we can't rely on this technology, I think.
l
